metadata.title: CVE-2019-12522 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Squid through 4.7. When Squid is run as root, itspawns its child processes as a lesser user, by default the user nobody.This is done via the leave_suid call. leave_suid leaves the Saved UID as 0.This makes it trivial for an attacker who has compromised the child processto escalate their privileges back to root.

criterions.comment: squid3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
